adrFormatAddress: 1285 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: I had a great experience. Ameer was so patient and understanding of my needs. He took his time to find out what’s my personal style and preference. He kept open communication regarding delivery. He delivered everything that I wanted and he even face timed me to make sure everything was to my liking. I’ll be back to purchase my dining room set and coffee table. Thank you for making this process seamless Stunning Furniture!

originalText.text: first and foremost, ONE OF THE BEST FURNITURE STORES I HAVE BEEN TO! Set 10/10 quality 10/10 if I was able to give more stars I would. And not to mention prices are unbeatable. My bed with the fireplace has tied my apartment all together and I finally have a beautiful bedroom. I would definitely recommend and come back again.

text.text: first and foremost, ONE OF THE BEST FURNITURE STORES I HAVE BEEN TO! Set 10/10 quality 10/10 if I was able to give more stars I would. And not to mention prices are unbeatable. My bed with the fireplace has tied my apartment all together and I finally have a beautiful bedroom. I would definitely recommend and come back again.

originalText.text: I ordered a black king sized step up bed and was sent the blue one. It had bugs flying all over it when I unboxed it. It also was ripped at the head board and on the steps. I called stunning furniture and they apologized and said that they would send the correct color out and have the old one removed. It’s been 2 months with nothing. They don’t answer the phone, text messages, emails, ig messages nothing. Horrible customer service.

text.text: I ordered a black king sized step up bed and was sent the blue one. It had bugs flying all over it when I unboxed it. It also was ripped at the head board and on the steps. I called stunning furniture and they apologized and said that they would send the correct color out and have the old one removed. It’s been 2 months with nothing. They don’t answer the phone, text messages, emails, ig messages nothing. Horrible customer service.

originalText.text: If I could leave 0 stars I would. These people are liars and scammers. If you are out of state DO NOT ORDER FROM THESE PEOPLE.  It took me 6 weeks to get the item, which isn’t the problem. I received half the pieces to the wrong couch. Plus theres a huge whole piece missing. I called the store the same day I received the item and notified them of the situation. Upon inspection he agreed with me and asked would I like for him to send the correct piece out or the missing piece. I choose the missing piece. He told me I should receive it within a week or 2. All this happened in August and here we are wayyyy in November and im still without the piece. Everytime I would call he would say it shipped out already, its at the dock, you should be getting it next week. I never received an email confirmation or anything. Now as of recently I can’t get anyone to answer the phone and they don’t even answer emails. These people sent me the wrong couch and lied through out the whole ordeal about them correcting it.

originalText.text: Did not receive what I ordered. When I spoke to the company they lied, and said that they would be sending me my furniture and it has been months. This place is a scam. With horrible customer service, not answering calls. I will never recommend this company to anyone.
